name: Hidden Objects Haunted Mystery Secret Ghost Towns
name_original: Hidden Objects Haunted Mystery Secret Ghost Towns
description:
Hidden Objects – Haunted Mystery Ghost Towns is an artistically crafted seek and find game with 30+ Eerie Levels.

Find Hidden Objects in Vacant, Mysterious Towns across the World. Explore the Shadowy Towns of No More!

Discover Abandoned Towns with Vacant Hotels, Old Jails, Rusted Cars, Vacant Churches, Broken-down Trains, Ramshackle Porches and Rickety Homes. Take an Eerie Trek Exploring Haunted Towns!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure is sure to entertain! “Detention Apps makes the Best Seek & Find Games!”

Hidden Objects – Haunted Mystery Ghost Towns features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Haunting Graphics
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Explore the Shadowy Towns of No More!
Drag Scene to Search


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
